title: SINcerely Megan
description: Megan's imagination and libido are out of control. She just can't stop fantasizing about Father Michaels. So when she steps into his confessional just to be closer to him and confesses all her sinful thoughts, she's surprised when Father Michaels offers her private counseling. Little does she know what Father Michaels has in store for her and it's nothing she could have imagined. The priest also has a secret past, one he thought he left behind him when he entered the priesthood. Will they be able to cage their lust or will the transgression ruin both their lives forever?Publisher's This book contains explicit sexual content, graphic language, and situations that some readers may find BDSM theme and content bondage, spanking, toys, anal play, masturbation, etc....
author: Anne O'Connell
